item.title: Aberlour Glasgow Bridges service
item.description: CB - Cheryl Burgess SS - Sandra Sweeten Child care and protection research collection. Talk by Cheryl Burgess and Sandra Sweeten, recorded 6th March 2012 CB Hello, I'm Cheryl Burgess, I am a Research Fellow in the School of Applied Social Science at Stirling University and I am going to talk to you today about the Aberlour Glasgow Bridges Service. I will also be joined by Sandra Sweeten who is the Service Manager for the service and she will also contribute to the talk.
